sourcesContent:
// Home.js import React from 'react'; import { library } from '@fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core'; import { faFire, faBell } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; library.add(faFire, faBell); const Home = () => { return (
{/* Profile Section */}
{/* Fire Icon */} {/* Notifications Icon */}
{/* Mood Section */}

How are you feeling today?

{/* Cards for Mobile */}

Happy

Feeling joyful and positive today.

Calm

Feeling relaxed and at peace.

{/* Daily Task Section */} {/* Daily Task Section */}

Daily Tasks

{/* Card 1 */}

Resources

Check out helpful resources.

{/* Card 2 */}

Mindfulness

Practice mindfulness for a peaceful mind.

); }; export default Home;
